mapper.select: SELECT dict_id, code, `name`, remark, create_time, creator, update_time, modifier FROM inbyte_dict WHERE dict_id = #{dictId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT dict_id, code, `name`, remark, create_time, creator, update_time, modifier FROM inbyte_dict WHERE deleted = 0
AND (code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') or name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR remark LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
ORDER BY dict_id ASC
